column1: 29590752$Gladiator Beast Octavius$$LIGHT$[Winged Beast/effect]$$$$$7$2500$1200$$$$When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Gladiator Beast" monster: Target 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card in the Spell & Trap Card Zone; destroy that target. At the end of your Battle Phase
